title: Hodaweisolp Golf Shirts for Men Dry Fit Print Moisture Wicking Performance Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
description: 【Moisture Wicking Polo】90% Polyester, 10% Spandex, lightweight, breathable, soft 4-way stretch fabric, allows you to keep cool and dry during exercise.
【Classic Fit】3-button placket, piping collar, bottom side vents design, short sleeve polo, regular fit golf shirt, easy care and keep good shape, well-made stitching.
【Multiple Sizes 】S-3XL. Please take our size chart before you order this dry-fit polos for men. The model is 6'1''tall, weighs 171lbs, and wears a size M.
【Occasion】Mens polo shirts perfect for exercise, like golf, tennis, badminton, hiking, and other sports outdoor activities. It's also great for casual daily wear with slacks, shorts or pants.
【Wash Tips】Machine wash, anti-fading, and anti-pilling do not bleach. If you have any questions about golf polo shirts, pls feel free to contact me at any time!
